value.fullName: Accept that, following the work, black tarmacadam patches may be evident on the property that a repair has been completed.
value.label: Accept that, following the work, black tarmacadam patches may be evident on the property that a repair has been completed.

value.fullName: I wish to decline the black tarmacadam final reinstatement and will carry out my own reinstatement privately.
value.label: I wish to decline the black tarmacadam final reinstatement and will carry out my own reinstatement privately.
